Text: Theatricals: Second Series:  As a follow-up to his 1894 book "Theatricals", James included two more unproduced plays in this volume, "The Album" and "The Reprobate".
Triplets:<unproduced plays

Text: Theatricals: Second Series:  James wrote a longer preface for this book, where he discussed writing for the theater and the sacrifices involved.
